section_title: Effect of demise of Crown on holding of office.
section_text: 1 1 The holding of any office under the Crown, whether within or without His Majesty’s dominions, shall not be affected, nor shall any fresh appointment thereto be rendered necessary, by the demise of the Crown. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
2 This Act may be cited as the Demise of the Crown Act 1901.
